snippet: The selection of Michael Sam by the St. Louis Rams has made gay fans of the N.F.L. more enthusiastic and is drawing newcomers to the game.
lead_paragraph: The selection of Michael Sam by the St. Louis Rams has made gay fans of the N.F.L. more enthusiastic and is drawing newcomers to the game.

headline.main: Drafting of Publicly Gay Player Thrills and Empowers Some Fans
headline.print_headline: Drafting of Publicly Gay Player Thrills and Empowers Some Fans
